about.label: Our Heritage
about.title: WMB Fırın
about.subtitle: Since 1895
about.paragraph1: What started as a small family oven in the late 19th century has blossomed into a culinary landmark of Istanbul. For over a century, we have remained true to the original methods—hand-rolled dough, wood-fired ovens, and the finest local ingredients.
about.paragraph2: Today, WMB Fırın represents a bridge between the past and present, serving generations of families the same crispy, savory perfection that our founders created.
